author: Eric Thompson
title: Application Security Posture Management (ASPM): The Invisible Shield for your Open Source Ecosystem
text:
Proactively Secure Your Software Supply Chain with Continuous Risk Management
In today’s fast-paced software development landscape, ensuring the security of your applications and open-source components is more critical than ever—that’s where Application Security Posture Management (ASPM) comes in. In this whitepaper, we explore how ASPM acts as the shield for your open source ecosystem, and enables you to:
Continuously monitor your applications to identify potential threats Prioritize risks and vulnerabilities to ensure your developers are working on what matters most Detect and patch vulnerabilities to ensure systematic adherence to governance and policy Common use cases for ASPM and how to evaluate the best tools for your business
